name: FallenGrid
description:
Combining the best of old school shoot-'em-up classics with sleek modern day visuals and mechanics, FallenGrid challenges players with a difficult-but-fair attitude straight out of an 80's arcade. Hop in your starfighter and blast through wave after wave of increasingly challenging alien invaders in your quest to restore peace to the galaxy!

-----

Alpha Features:

- Wave-based campaign mode

- Multiple star systems with unique enemies and obstacles

- Unlockable ships and weapons

- Power-ups, bonuses, and more to come in the full version!

-----

Planned Features:

- Achievements

- More expansive campaign with new star systems and exotic enemies

- Additional ships, weapons, and power-ups

- Daily challenge mode with online leader boards

-----
